item.title: Developing a Targeted Marketing Strategy for Government Contracting
item.description: Unlock the secrets to effectively marketing your business to government entities with a targeted strategy designed specifically for government contracting.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Gov Con)

item.title: The Pre-Award Survey: What It Is and How to Prepare
item.description: Learn what a pre-award survey is, why its important, and how to best prepare your business to ace it and land that all-important government contract.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Gov Con)

item.title: Finding Your Niche: Identifying the Right Government Contract Opportunities
item.description: Discover the keys to pinpointing the perfect government contract opportunities for your business, ensuring a competitive edge and a prosperous venture into the world of federal procurement.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Gov Con)

item.title: Using Capabilities Statements to Market Your Business to Government Agencies
item.description: Unlock the secrets of creating an impactful capabilities statement to effectively market your business to government agencies.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Gov Con)
